/* 게시판 리스트 검색 구문 추가 */
SELECT rnum, ord_num, ord_name, ord_phone, to_char(ord_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as ord_date, ord_status, ord_trn, m_id FROM ( SELECT rownum as rnum, joinList.* FROM (
SELECT * FROM order_list ol INNER JOIN member m ON ol.m_num = m.m_num ORDER BY ord_num ASC ) joinList WHERE
rownum <= #{cnt} - ((#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}) ) orderList WHERE rnum > #{cnt} - (#{pageNum} * #{amount}) ORDER BY rnum DESC

/* 엑셀 리스트에 필요한 전체 목록 반환 */
SELECT ord_num, ord_name, ord_phone, to_char(ord_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as ord_date, ord_status, ord_trn, m_id FROM order_list ol INNER JOIN member m ON ol.m_num = m.m_num ORDER BY ord_num DESC

/* 주문의 상세정보 조회 */
SELECT ol.ord_num, ord_status, ord_name, ord_phone, ord_email, ord_trn, sh_name, sh_residence, sh_phone, sh_request, pay_method, pay_price FROM order_list ol INNER JOIN shipping sh ON ol.ord_num = sh.ord_num INNER JOIN payment pay ON ol.ord_num = pay.ord_num WHERE ol.ord_num = #{ord_num}

/* 전체 레코드 수 조회 */
SELECT count(*) FROM order_list ol INNER JOIN member m ON ol.m_num = m.m_num
